sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ATFFormHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ATFFormHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ATFFormHelper = Class.create();
ATFFormHelper.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
    },

	/** 
	 * getFormUIAsChoiceList is a deprecated function, consider using getFormUIAsChoiceListWithSysID()
	 */
	getFormUIAsChoiceList: function() {
		var formUIChoiceList = new GlideChoiceList();
		formUIChoiceList.add("standard_ui", gs.getMessage("Standard UI"));

		var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_aw_master_config");
		gr.query();

		while (gr.next())
			formUIChoiceList.add(gr.workspace_url, gr.name);

		return formUIChoiceList;
	},
	
	/** 
	 * Consider using getFormUIAsChoiceListWithSysID() instead of getFormUIAsChoiceList()
	 * Workspace URL will now be calculated using sys_id
	 */
	getFormUIAsChoiceListWithSysID: function() {
		var formUIChoiceList = new GlideChoiceList();
		formUIChoiceList.add("standard_ui", gs.getMessage("Standard UI"));

		var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_aw_master_config");
		gr.query();

		while (gr.next())
			formUIChoiceList.add(gr.getUniqueValue(), gr.name);

		return formUIChoiceList;
	},

    type: 'ATFFormHelper'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-08-16 21:03:41</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>596351bde7533300b5646ea8c2f6a961</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ATFFormHelper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Automated Test Framework" source="com.glide.automated_testing_framework">0dd2c54f6d6620100acb70b353433008</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_596351bde7533300b5646ea8c2f6a961</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-09-16 22:44:01</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>1056</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
